data.name: Orc
data.description:
The Horde - Orc [Q]
Units:
+12% damage

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Bloodlust (+13% attack rate for 60s)
Purge (Slows and removes buffs)
Chain Lightning (Deals 150 damage to 8 units)

Traits: Basic at a first glance, but actually far more tricky to play. Easy to learn, but difficult to master. Very buff and aura dependent race. Augments troop damage output with blind rage and frenzy.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+6 unit armor
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+20% unit damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Frostwolf Elites [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Feral Instincts
+1 level of Taste for Blood

Reduces spell damage to Grunt, Scout, Shaman and Raider by 20% and increases their hit points by 50.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Orb of Lightning [E]
bonuses.description:
Increases Grunt, Raider and Shaman attack rate by 7% and gives them 14%/18%/22% chance to deal 25 damage up to 3 units with each attack.
(upgrades together with Fortress)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Orc Warlord [Q]
bonuses.description:
Voltrak replaces Rexxar

Hero Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20

Role: Hybrid (Tank/Fighter)

Can learn:
Deafening Roar (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Inner Vitality (Self Spell)
500-2000 HP over 10s, 10-22 bonus HP/s for 15-33s
(45 second cooldown)

Shield Slam (Passive Skill)
18-30% for 1.3-1.9s stun

Heavy Shield (Passive Skill)
16-40% to block an attack

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Veteran Troops [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Battle Frenzy

Warrior replaces Grunt
Melee Unit
-20% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Inner Vitality (Self Spell)
(Heals 200 HP over 10s)
Bash (Passive Skill)
(35% for 40 dmg, 2 sec stun)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Arcanite Blades
Arcanite Armor
Seasoned Troops
Battle Frenzy

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Elder Shaman [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Lightning bolt

Elder Shaman replaces Shaman
Spellcaster
+10% attack rate
+75 MP
Abilities:
Fireball (Damage Spell)
(300-450 damage to Air unit)
Healing Ward (Summoning Spell)
(8 HP/sec for 6/8/10/12 seconds)
Upgrades used:
Shamanism (Upgrades Abilities)
Arcanite Armor
Lightning Bolt

Type: Strong Anti Air / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Spirit Wolf [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Endurance Aura
(+1 start level)
+1 level of Pillage

Spirit Wolf replaces Raider
Siege Unit
+3 armor
+150 HP
Abilities:
Feral Howl (Disable Spell)
(-15% speed for 5 seconds)
(affects organic units only)
Deep Wound (Passive Skill)
(30% chance for 50 dmg, 0.5 stun)
(affect mechanical units only)
(affect non-hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Arcanite Blades
Arcanite Armor
Feral Instincts
Battle Frenzy
Endurance Aura
Pillage
Seasoned Troops

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Horde Warmachine [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Flaming Attack

Horde Warmachine replaces Catapult
Siege Unit (Range)
+20% attack rate
+800 HP
Abilities:
Firing Position (Self Spell)
(+40% bonus attack rate for 30 seconds)
Powerful Fire (Orb Effect)
(15% chance for 125 damage in 250 AoE)
(25% when in Firing Position)
Upgrades used:
Ranged Weapons
Arcanite Armor
Flaming Attack

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [X]
bonuses.description:
Icreases Fortress and Shaman mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Fortress spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Fortress mana reg

upgrades.description:
Gives:
+12 Shaman damage
-10% Shaman spell cooldown

Arrow Voley

-5s cooldown

-20s cooldown

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

Orc Spearthrower replaces Scout
Range Unit
+20% attack rate
+50 HP
+4 damage

(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: Orc Warlock [D]
bonuses.description:

+1 level of Seasoned Troops

Warlock replaces Shaman
Spellcaster
+2 MP/sec
+25 HP
+100 MP
Abilities:
Feral Spirit (Summoning Spell)
(summons Wolf Spirit for 15/20/25/30 sec)
Concussion (Disable Spell)
(Gives enemy 25% chance to miss)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Shamanism (Upgrades Abilities)
Arcanite Armor
Lightning Bolt
Feral Instincts
Seasoned Troops

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH [C]
bonuses.description:
Embrace the rage, enjoy the chaos! Orcs were born for WAAAR!

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH
spells.description:
The more we kill, the scarier we are, the more we fight, the stronger we become!

Gain more power by killing enemy units. There are a total of 5 phases, 5th being the last.
You can use WAAAAAAAGH ability on any phase. WAAAAAAAGH boosts your standing forces only

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: WAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH requirements
spells.description:
1) Kill 250 enemy units and go to next phase
2) Kill 500 enemy units and go to next phase
3) Kill 1000 enemy units and go to next phase
4) Kill 2000 enemy units and go to next phase
5) Kill 3500 enemy units and reach final phase

spells.name: WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH Tier [1]
spells.description:
+5% damage, +5% speed for 30 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(300 sec cooldown)

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Frenzy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage ability
Affects: Grunt and Raider
(affects Thrall's and Rexxar's summons)

Lv1: +12% damage for 5 seconds
Lv2: +24% damage for 10 seconds
Lv3: +36% damage for 15 seconds
Lv4: +48% damage for 20 seconds

spells.name: Battle Frenzy (Lv1)
spells.description:
Increases damage by 12%.
Lasts 30 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Seasoned Troops
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration and HP
Affects: Grunt, Scout, Shaman and Raider

Lv1: +1.5 HP/s, +25 HP
Lv2: +3 HP/s, +50 HP
Lv3: +4.5 HP/s, +75 HP
Lv4: +6 HP/s, +100 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Slow Poison
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Scout and Wind Rider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 10 seconds
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 12 seconds
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 14 seconds
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Taste for Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: individual Hero empowerment on Hero kill
Affects: Your Heroes
(Rexxar, Samuro, Thrall, Kor'Gall accordingly)

Lv1: +125 HP, +6 dmg, +0.2 MP regen, +3 dmg
Lv2: +250 HP, +9 dmg, +0.4 MP regen, +6 dmg
Lv3: +375 HP, +12 dmg, +0.6 MP regen, +9 dmg
Lv4: +500 HP, +15 dmg, +0.8 MP regen, +12 dmg

spells.name: Ensnare (Lv1)
spells.description: Causes a target enemy unit to be bound to the ground so that it cannot move for <Aens,Dur2> seconds. Air units that are ensnared can be attacked as though they were land units.

towerUpgrades.name: Endurance Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus speed to nearby units
Affects: Raider

Lv1: +5% attack, +3% move, 400 AoE
Lv2: +10% attack, +6% move, 500 AoE
Lv3: +15% attack, +9% move, 600 AoE
Lv4: +20% attack, +12% move, 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Feral Instincts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion
Affects: Raider, Wind Rider and Shaman
(affects Thrall's and Rexxar's summons)

Lv1: +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Flaming Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Catapult
(affects buildings only)

Lv1: 8 damage/sec for 20 seconds
Lv2: 16 damage/sec for 25 seconds
Lv3: 24 damage/sec for 30 seconds
Lv4: 32 damage/sec for 35 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Lightning Bolt
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun and damage on each attack
Affects: Shaman
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 10% chance for 1.1 sec stun, 10 dmg
Lv2: 20% chance for 1.2 sec stun, 15 dmg
Lv3: 30% chance for 1.3 sec stun, 20 dmg
Lv4: 40% chance for 1.4 sec stun, 25 dmg

towerUpgrades.name: Pillage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus gold with each attack
Affects: Raider
(affects buildings and mechanical units)

Lv1: 3 and 1 gold per hit
Lv2: 6 and 2 gold per hit
Lv3: 9 and 3 gold per hit
Lv4: 12 and 4 gold per hit

t1spell.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.description:

Deals 300 damage every 3s for 18s.
(has 3s delay after activation)

summon 2-5 random beast for 30-90s
(60-120 second cooldown)

Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Assassin

27-45% to do 4x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

20-32% to deal 180-300 AoE damage
(when attacked by Heroes)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
13-25% to evade an attack

Worthy Foe (Disable Spell)
4-7 sec stun
(if enemy Hero is close, gives -6-18 armor to them)
(doesn't affect Special Unit)
(30 second cooldown)

skills.name: Divine Shield - [Level 1]
skills.description: An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells for 6 seconds.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

30-60 damage/sec for 10s
(700 area of effect)

spells.name: Mana Burn (2)
spells.description: Sends a bolt of negative energy that burns 50 points of a target enemy unit's mana. The mana combusts, dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.

spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.description:
Increases a friendly unit's attack rate by 13%.
Lasts 60 seconds.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 8 times, dealing 200 damage to enemy units.

spells.name: Purge
spells.description: Removes all buffs from a target unit, and slows its movement speed. Purged units will slowly regain their movement speed over 15 seconds.

spells.name: Banish 1
spells.description: Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by 75% for 3 seconds. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.
